steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(3)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 1), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(2), number_in_box(1), put_result_into_box(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 2), increase(2)),
Put(number_in_box(5), into_box(7)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 2?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在2号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 3
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Multiply: ( number in box 2 ) * ( number in box 1 ), put result into box 2.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Change Instruction 6: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Put ( number in box 5 ) into box 7
desc_zh: 更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在3号盒子中
判断：指令2中第1个盒子的编号比1号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：2号盒子中的数字*1号盒子中的数字，将结果放在2号盒子中。
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比8号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令6：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
将5号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
